xxl.core.spatial.cursors
Class PlaneSweep

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor<E>
      xxl.core.cursors.joins.SortMergeJoin
          xxl.core.spatial.cursors.PlaneSweep
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator, Cursor
public class PlaneSweep
extends SortMergeJoin

Plane Sweep for two-dimensional data. The Sweepline is hash-based. See Lars Arge et.al. VLDB 1998. (prerelease for prerelease of XXL)

Nested Class Summary
static class PlaneSweep.KPEPlaneSweepComparator
          Compares two Objects with respect to the first dimension of ther left borders in ascending order.
static class PlaneSweep.PlaneSA
          A SweepArea based on hash-buckets
static class PlaneSweep.PlaneSweepComparator
          Compares two Objects with respect to a user specified dimension of their left or right borders in ascending order.
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class xxl.core.cursors.joins.SortMergeJoin
SortMergeJoin.Type

                  Comparator comparator,

This is the top-level constructor for the class PlaneSweep.two inputs, does not require the input to be sorted (two inputs).

Parameters:
input0 - the first input
input1 - the second input
newSorter0 - a function that returns a sorting method for the first input
newSorter1 - a function that returns a sorting method for the second input
sweepArea0 - the SweepArea of the first input
sweepArea1 - the SweepArea of the second input
comparator - the Comparator for comparing two elements from the inputs
newResult - a function that creates an object from the output of the join

This is another top-level constructir of the class PlaneSweep

Parameters:
input0 - the first input
input1 - the second input
newSorter0 - a function that returns a sorting method for the first input
newSorter1 - a function that returns a sorting method for the second input
comparator - the Comparator for comparing two elements from the inputs
universe - a bounding box of the data space
noOfBuckets - the number of buckets of the hashtable
initialBucketSize - the initial size of the buckets of the hashtable
